posts.post_content: Let me know what you have! Looking for a nice Tris Speaker to add, along with any Honus Wagner. Thanks!
Too bad, but you're a couple days too late for the Wagner. There was one for sale, and nearly a PSA 4 at that!

[quote name="Sean" post=1857391]Too bad, but you're a couple days too late for the Wagner. There was one for sale, and nearly a PSA 4 at that![/QUOTE]

Sold?  Never for sale?  Semantics. But it was at least a 4 all day.
